titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd upon St. Matthew's Day, 1699 before the right honourable the Lord Mayor and the right worshipful and worshipful the governors of all the city-hospitals at Christ-Church, London / by Thomas Staynoe.
titleStmt.author: Staynoe, Thomas, d. 1708.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
